title: Rabi Lamichhane Vows to End Karnali Region's Use as Political 'Parking Lot'
content: Rabi Lamichhane pledged to end the practice of using Karnali as a political backup region and emphasized equitable development and balanced regional development policies.

title: Understanding Uterine Fibroids: Causes, Symptoms, and Prevention Tips for Women's Health
content: The article discusses uterine fibroids, explaining their possible causes, common symptoms, health risks, and preventive care strategies for women's well-being.

title: Former Bank Colleagues Face Off in Syangja-1 Election Battleground
content: Two former colleagues from the banking sector are contesting against each other in the Syangja-1 constituency, turning the election into a closely watched political rivalry.

title: T20 World Cup Enters Super 8 Stage: Teams and Fixtures Confirmed
content: The T20 World Cup has officially moved into the Super 8 stage, with qualified teams confirmed and upcoming fixtures announced for the next round.

title: Nepali Congress Leader Sharma Stresses Need for Mature Leadership Amidst Youth Discontent
content: Leader Sharma emphasized the importance of responsible and experienced leadership to address growing frustration and dissatisfaction among young voters.

title: Rastriya Swatantra Party Unveils Manifesto with 18 Key Slogans for Upcoming Elections
content: The Rastriya Swatantra Party introduced its election manifesto featuring 18 major commitments focused on governance reform, accountability, and institutional change.

title: Iran Builds Concrete Shield at Sensitive Military Site Amid Heightened US Tensions, Satellite Images Show
content: Satellite imagery suggests Iran has constructed a reinforced concrete structure at a sensitive military facility amid escalating tensions with the United States.

title: Government Imposes Strict Regulations on E-commerce Operations
content: The government has introduced stricter regulations to oversee e-commerce platforms, aiming to improve compliance, consumer protection, and digital transaction transparency.

title: Gold Prices Rise in Nepali Market on Thursday
content: Gold prices increased in the domestic market following fluctuations in international bullion rates and changes in global demand.

title: Mark Zuckerberg Defends Meta in Court Over Allegations of Designing Social Media to Be Addictive for Teens
content: Mark Zuckerberg defended Meta in court against claims that the company intentionally designed its social media platforms to encourage addictive behavior among teenagers.

title: UML manifesto pledges Rs200 trillion economy, sweeping cash incentives
content: The UML manifesto outlines ambitious economic targets, including plans to significantly expand the national economy and introduce broad financial incentive programs.

title: Upendra Yadav faces fresh test of strength in Saptari
content: Upendra Yadav is facing a challenging electoral contest in Saptari, where shifting alliances and local dynamics are testing his political influence.

title: Ex-king says March polls won’t solve nation’s crisis
content: The former king expressed doubts that the upcoming March elections will resolve the country's ongoing political and institutional challenges.

title: Nepali Congress unveils its election manifesto in Janakpur
content: The Nepali Congress formally presented its election manifesto in Janakpur, highlighting its policy priorities and development commitments.

title: Polling in mountain-area centres may be deferred if weather worsens
content: Election officials indicated that adverse weather conditions could potentially delay polling in high-altitude and mountainous regions.
